author: Bloomberg
content: Monday, October 15, 2018 (Bloomberg) -- For 45 years, it’s been considered out of bounds for Saudi Arabia. But all of a sudden, Riyadh made what many read as a veiled threat to use the kingdom’s oil wealth as a political weapon -- something unheard of since t… [+3643 chars]

title: Saudis Break 45-Year Taboo with Veiled Oil Threat
